extracts.sentence: 4.3.8.1.   MSR - A3V1 - The anti-surge controller response time shall be suitable for the process application and shall be determine at the beginning of the project phase. It needs to be bellow 200 ms.
extracts.extendedsentence: 4.3.8.    Anti surge controller 4.3.8.1.   MSR - A3V1 - The anti-surge controller response time shall be suitable for the process application and shall be determine at the beginning of the project phase. It needs to be bellow 200 ms. 4.3.8.2.   MSR - A3 - The anti-surge controller should receive directly hardwired, 4-20 mA analog input signals for suction flow dp, suction pressure, suction temperature, discharge pressure and discharge temperature. The anti-surge controller shall use these inputs to calculate deviation from the compressor surge control line 4.3.8.3

extracts.sentence: 4.3.6.2.   MSR - A2V1 - Valve response time: valve needs to open in less than 2 second by command and less than 1 second by solenoid action (pneumatic boosters might be required in order to achieve these times).
extracts.extendedsentence: Map example extract from vendor CCC manual Typical valve characteristic curves 4.3.6.2.   MSR - A2V1 - Valve response time: valve needs to open in less than 2 second by command and less than 1 second by solenoid action (pneumatic boosters might be required in order to achieve these times). Without more than 0.4s of time delay and without significant overshoot.   In order to achieve this performance, the air instrument supply to the valve needs to be sufficient and air accumulator might be necessary.   A continuous position indicator shall be installed (in order to detect any abnormal opening of the valve) (This feedback may be given by a smart positioner).   The air instrument pressure shall be indicated on a panel located near to the air regulator

extracts.sentence: The air instrument pressure shall be indicated on a panel located near to the air regulator. Design of the valves for response time shall be realized with value of the minimum air instrument pressure of the network.         4.3.6.3.
extracts.extendedsentence: In order to achieve this performance, the air instrument supply to the valve needs to be sufficient and air accumulator might be necessary.   A continuous position indicator shall be installed (in order to detect any abnormal opening of the valve) (This feedback may be given by a smart positioner).   The air instrument pressure shall be indicated on a panel located near to the air regulator. Design of the valves for response time shall be realized with value of the minimum air instrument pressure of the network.         4.3.6.3.   MSR -  V1 E3 - These valves shall be equipped with smart positioners, Positioner accuracy should be around 1% or better. 4.3.6.4.   MSR - A2 - valve should be located at a high point in order to avoid condensate / liquid accumulation

extracts.extendedsentence: 3.4.2 Control Systems       3.4.2.1 The vendor shall review the purchaser's control system.       3.4.2.2 Unless otherwise specified the anti-surge system shall be designed and provided by the Vendor.   The anti-surge controller and transmitters must be instruments dedicated to anti-surge control with response time short enough to prevent surge.   The anti-surge valve must have an opening time of 2 seconds or less, equipped with a volume booster.   Th e air supply line shall be ND 3⁄4 "  at least.     The anti surge loop shall be designed for a mass flow equal to the compressor design mass flow.   Anti-surge system and controller manufacturer shall be submitted to TOTAL  for approval with the proposal.       3.4.3 Instrument and Control Panels

extracts.extendedsentence: The anti-surge system divides the compressor characteristic curves into zones, splitted up by the different lines. Each zone is subject to a different response of the anti-surge controller. Figure - Compressor Characteristic Curves For large molecular weight variations, the compressor Manufacturer shall super-imposed the performance curves (from minimum to maximum molecular weights) showing the location of the operating points as well as the surge and the surge control lines. The compressor Manufacturer shall also clearly indicate the control strategy implemented. 6.1     Start-up The anti-surge controller shall keep the anti-surge valve fully open up to the minimum compressor operating speed. 6.2     Surge line The surge line position as defined on the expected performance curves shall be checked during the shop tests

extracts.sentence: The control mode shall be via an integral I/P converter with a digital positioner. This signal shall be driven by the anti-surge controller. A valve position feedback shall be transmitted to the controller.
extracts.extendedsentence: The valve shall be flow to open type. The valve shall be operated either in automatic control mode or quick open mode or manual mode. The control mode shall be via an integral I/P converter with a digital positioner. This signal shall be driven by the anti-surge controller. A valve position feedback shall be transmitted to the controller. The pneumatic control to the actuator shall be via a booster. The valve shall open in less than 2 seconds by command. Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds

extracts.sentence: Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds. The valve, the associated pneumatic panel and the solenoid shall be fail-safe.
extracts.extendedsentence: The pneumatic control to the actuator shall be via a booster. The valve shall open in less than 2 seconds by command. Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds. The valve, the associated pneumatic panel and the solenoid shall be fail-safe. The anti-surge valve shall be failed open. The valve shall be capable to fully open within 1 second maximum via solenoid valve. Dead time of solenoid valve shall be less than 100 ms. The anti-surge valve actuator shall be single-acting spring-return design

only_extracts.sentence: The control mode shall be via an integral I/P converter with a digital positioner. This signal shall be driven by the anti-surge controller. A valve position feedback shall be transmitted to the controller.
only_extracts.extendedsentence: The valve shall be flow to open type. The valve shall be operated either in automatic control mode or quick open mode or manual mode. The control mode shall be via an integral I/P converter with a digital positioner. This signal shall be driven by the anti-surge controller. A valve position feedback shall be transmitted to the controller. The pneumatic control to the actuator shall be via a booster. The valve shall open in less than 2 seconds by command. Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds

only_extracts.sentence: Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds. The valve, the associated pneumatic panel and the solenoid shall be fail-safe.
only_extracts.extendedsentence: The pneumatic control to the actuator shall be via a booster. The valve shall open in less than 2 seconds by command. Dead time of the positioner shall be less than 300 ms. The closure rate of the valve shall be controlled by the anti-surge controller output signal and shall be adjustable between 15 to 100 seconds. The valve, the associated pneumatic panel and the solenoid shall be fail-safe. The anti-surge valve shall be failed open. The valve shall be capable to fully open within 1 second maximum via solenoid valve. Dead time of solenoid valve shall be less than 100 ms. The anti-surge valve actuator shall be single-acting spring-return design
